document.full_text: north korea's rubber-stamp assembly will meet on thursday amid reports that leader kim jong-il's son will likely be given a key post in the powerful national defense commission to further consolidate his position as leader-in-waiting.
document.title: north korea assembly meets, new post likely for leader's son
lines_and_colors: north korea's rubber-stamp assembly will meet on thursday amid reports that leader kim jong-il's son will likely be given a key post in the powerful national defense commission to further consolidate his position as leader-in-waiting.
